items.title: Trump's move to exempt pharma from tariffs brings cheer to industry
items.description: The exemption applies broadly to all pharmaceutical products, ensuring that the drugmakers avoid immediate cost pressures

items.title: Should investors bet on a potential stake sale in this mutual fund?
items.description: UTI AMC is one of the top 10 mutual fund houses in the country

items.title: EIH: Is there enough room for this hotel stock to grow?
items.description: The hotel industry is experiencing an up-cycle while there is a shift in consumer preference towards premium properties

items.title: US tariff speed breakers for Indian auto firms
items.description: India exported $3.67 billion worth of automotive components to the US during H1FY25

items.title: Fortis Healthcare wins bid for 'Fortis' trademark in public auction
items.description: The Fortis trademarks were previously held by entities owned and controlled by the erstwhile promoters of the company.

items.title: Tesla sales slump to lowest since 2022 amid anti-Elon Musk backlash
items.description: Demonstrations have picked up in recent weeks in response to Musk asserting himself in Washington and beyond in support of far-right candidates and causes

items.title: Donald Trump’s trust opens the door to tapping $2.1 billion media stake
items.description: Trump Media & Technology Group Corp. shares slumped 8.6% in pre-market trading after the company filed on April 1 to register up to 142.5 million shares and warrants for sale.

items.title: Power Watch | Officials say enough power to meet Delhi's summer demand, but overload and local failures a key risk
items.description: Delhi’s peak power demand is expected to cross last year's record this summer, and the state government is preparing for network overload and other local factors. A Tata Power-DDL spokesperson said dedicated round-the-clock teams have been set up to attend breakdown and for supply restoration.

items.title: Amul brand FY25 revenue rises 12% to Rs 90k cr; GCMMF turnover up 11% at Rs 66k cr
items.description: GCMMF is the world’s largest farmer-owned dairy cooperative, having 36 lakh farmers across 18,600 villages of Gujarat and its 18 member unions procure 300 lakh litres of milk per day.

items.title: Macrotech discloses 'fabricated and false' board resolution by HoABL entities in trademark tussle
items.description: The allegations by Macrotech of 'fabricated and false board resolutions' against the House Of Abhinandan Lodha are serious in nature. The Board has set up a Special Committee of Directors to look into the matter, said the company, with Abhishek Lodha not being part of the panel.

items.title: GSMA urges telecom dept to include 6GHz band in next spectrum auctions
items.description: GSMA said the move will ensure that all necessary IMT spectrum bands—across mid-band and high-band frequencies—are made available together

items.title: Ashok Leyland infuses Rs 500 crore into UK-based Switch Mobility, some funds may flow into India unit
items.description: Ashok Leyland had previously shared plans to invest Rs 500 crore into the holding company of Switch Mobility for capex requirement. Optare is the holding entity for Switch UK as well as Switch India, and a part of the fund is expected to flow into the Indian arm as well.

items.title: Venkat Jasti’s billion-dollar gamble: Can Suven Life crack the CNS drug puzzle?
items.description: The Suven Life chairman is staking his fortune on a risky but potentially game-changing pipeline of central nervous system drugs, which are notoriously difficult to develop

items.title: Auto sector rides fast in March 2025
items.description: Strong sales growth seen across segments helped by festive season, bumper Rabi harvest, and increasing disposable incomes

items.title: Hindustan Aeronautics Ltd is fortifying its own defence
items.description: The focus is on execution and capacity expansion

items.title: Bankers get boost in Asia Pacific as M&A growth tops US, Europe
items.description: The volume of mergers and acquisitions in APAC is up 19% from the first quarter last year
